description:
Learn to read and pronounce Russian's Cyrillic alphabet in just 110 minutes of fun, video instruction. If you find the Russian alphabet intimidating, or feel it's probably too hard for you, then this is the course for you. You're about to discover just how easy Russian can be to read when taught the right way!

There are two unique features to our Russian Alphabet Mastery:

* The course uses the modern learning technique known as 'Contextual learning'. With this method, you will learn effortlessly, without having to memorize anything.

* Each time you learn a new Russian letter, you will be shown actual Russian street signs and billboards that you can read and understand. By the end of the course you will have read and understood hundreds of Russian signs.

Although total video time is under two hours, it's recommended that you spread your viewing time over a few days, to maximize retention.
title: Russian Alphabet Mastery
